summary: Caroll Spinney has been Sesame Street's Big Bird and Oscar the Grouch since 1969; at 78-years-old, he has no intention of stopping.
cast: Jim Henson|Frank Oz|Jane Henson|Steve Whitmire|Caroll Spinney|Matt Vogel|Dave Goelz|Roscoe Orman|Alison Bartlett|Fran Brill|Sonia Manzano|Jerry Nelson|Eric Jacobson|Emilio Delgado|Joey Mazzarino|Bob McGrath|Leslie Carrara-Rudolph|Loretta Long|Cheryl Henson|Frank Avruch|Carmen Osbahr|Debra Spinney|Lianzi Ouyang|Martin G. Baker|Joan Ganz Cooney|Norman Stiles|Judy Valentine|Lara MacLean|Victor DiNapoli|Carol-Lynn Parente|Tony Thaxton|Michael Schupbach|Laurent Linn|Michael Davis|J. Milligan|Kitty Carlisle|Chevy Chase|Kevin Clash|Anderson Cooper|Billy Crystal|Danny DeVito|Jimmy Fallon|Robin Gibb|Bob Hope|Richard Hunt|Michael Jackson|Waylon Jennings|Will Lee|Jay Leno|David Letterman|Seth Meyers|Garry Moore|Conan O'Brien|Barack Obama|Mitt Romney|Ed Schultz|Jon Stewart|Jon Stone|Barbara Walters|Flip Wilson
director: Directors: Dave LaMattina, Chad N. Walker (as Chad Walker)
title: I Am Big Bird: The Caroll Spinney Story
